item.description:
Our second softball game is scheduled for June 12, 2011 from 1-4pm. 

 

 The cost per person to attend this meetup is $2.00 which covers the cost of the field permit. 

 

After the game we can head out for drinks and a bite to eat for those of you that are interested at:

 

The Newtowne Grille

838 Boston Road Billerica, MA

I'm hoping to schedule more games but it has been difficult to obtain a permit because all the fields are already being used for little league season.  Have an alternative ???

 

This game is a cross meetup between :

 

http://www.meetup.com/Friends-Of-Jen/about/

http://www.meetup.com/PortsmouthAndBeyond/events/17984981/

http://www.meetup.com/Dating-Meeting-in-So-NH-the-Merrimack-Valley/events/18102211/

http://www.meetup.com/SocialFun/events/17984411/

http://www.meetup.com/divorcesupport-276/

 

See you all at the game!!

group.name: The Portsmouth "and beyond" Nite Out Meetup Group

item.name: Softball - Round TWO!! (Billerica MA)
